destinations.name: Barcelona
destinations.description: Barcelona is known for its unique architecture, including the famous Sagrada Familia. It offers beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich cultural experiences.

destinations.name: Madrid
destinations.description: Madrid, the capital of Spain, is famous for its art, historic sites, and lively atmosphere. It is home to world-class museums and beautiful parks.

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: Paris, the City of Light, is celebrated for its art, fashion, and gastronomy. The Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre-Dame Cathedral are iconic landmarks.

destinations.name: Rome
destinations.description: Rome is a city steeped in history and culture. It's famous for its ancient ruins, including the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and the Vatican City.

destinations.name: Amsterdam
destinations.description: Amsterdam is known for its picturesque canals, historic houses, and vibrant nightlife. It offers a unique blend of history and modernity.

destinations.name: Copenhagen
destinations.description: Copenhagen is a charming city with a rich cultural scene, historic landmarks, and a laid-back atmosphere. It's the home of Hans Christian Andersen.
